channel.title: M10 on Richard Sumilang
channel.description: Recent content in M10 on Richard Sumilang

item.title: Leica M10 Review
item.description: Sure, I’ve been giving Leica a lot of praise in my posts because it’s really that great of a company that focuses on the essentials but it’s not all rainbows and unicorns. You’d expect such a high valued item to be closer to perfect but here are some things that could be better.
